entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Expand API surface for DateTime, DateTimeOffset, DateOnly, TimeOnly, and TimeSpan #113033
    Future
  • [area-Tools-ILLink]: NotImplementedException: We currently don't handle function pointer types. #113031
  • QuicConnection.ConnectAsync() connection failure causes memory leak. #113030

Closed

  • net9.0 app crash when run #113029
  • Requires Dynamic Code on a default constructor not respected when inherited. #112931
  • Question: Is .NET behavior proper in the presence of the `\\?\` prefix? What does "\\?\." exactly mean? #39300
  • `Directory.EnumerateFiles` does not respect per-directory case-sensitivity setting #39370
  • Can the GetProcessesByName method reduce the number of arrays and Process objects created? #40768

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove some bounds checks around Vector.Create(Span) #113035
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Support Telemetry Schema Url in tracing and metrics #113034
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 10.0.0
  • Use minipal_getcpufeatures to detect for AVX #113032
    area-GC-coreclr

Merged

  • JIT: more inlining with EH prep work #113023
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Generate calls to interface methods through resolve helper #112406
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Optimize bit operations of BigInteger #113005
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [mono] Implement `AssemblyExtensions.TryGetRawMetadata`. #111642
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Add benchmarks.run_pgo_optrepeat collection #112750
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use SSA-based ComputeRange in assertprop #112824
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: enable inlining methods with EH #112998
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove a few unsafe bits in BCL #111643
    area-Meta, reduce-unsafe
  • Avoid `Unsafe.As` in `BitConverter` #112616
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, reduce-unsafe
  • Add test for external assembly probe mechanism #113007
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • [9.0] Make counting of IO completion work items more precise on Windows #112794
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Threading, 9.0.x
  • Separate code manager for the interpreter #112985
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Use collection expressions in array.cs #113028
    needs-area-label
  • Implement software write watch for GC heap feature for arm32. #113017
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Cached interface dispatch for coreclr #111771
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Experimental PR #111004
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [9.0] Make CPU utilization checks in the thread pool configurable #112791
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 9.0.4
